subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: how to transcribe air and ear
msgSnippet: ... Yes, I heartily agree! I think I need to clarify my toy remark in which I questioned if QS was just a toy. This was a rhetorical question. I didn t meant
messageBody:
othermale wrote:

> Which, incidentally, touches on another point: I must comment that
> the Read/Shaw agenda was vastly more ambitious than popping out yet
> another shorthand.

Yes, I heartily agree! I think I need to clarify my "toy" remark in
which I questioned if QS was just a toy. This was a rhetorical question.
I didn't meant to suggest that it really was a plaything.

Paul

> Which, incidentally, touches on another point: I must comment that
> the Read/Shaw agenda was vastly more ambitious than popping out yet

Yes, I heartily agree! I think I need to clarify my "toy" remark in
